attributes.action: Uphold the will of the people and leave the Eu
attributes.additional_details: At every opportunity the government are denying the will of the people,  article 50 should not be revoked and we shouldn’t be asking for an extension as Mrs May has had 3 years and got nowhere so an extension is just delaying tactics putting off the inevitable . If you voted to leave and she hasn’t changed your mind for you , then sign this petition and let’s give her a shout out to let her and her government know we’re still here and waiting for her to get us clean out of the eu’s grasp.
attributes.background:
Uphold the will of the people and leave the Eu on 29th March. 
17.5 million of us voted to leave the Eu so we could run  our country, we did not vote on leaving to still be governed by Eu rules as mays deal does . After nearly 3 years with no resolution we should now leave with no deal .
